author: Sanya Mansoor
title: Dr. Birx: It’s Unclear How Long Immunity Lasts for Those Who Have Recovered From Coronavirus
description: Dr. Deborah Birx said Sunday on CBS News that it's still unclear how long immunity lasts for those who have recovered from the coronavirus.
content:
Dr. Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus task force coordinator, said Sunday on CBS News’ Face the Nation that it’s still unclear how long immunity lasts for those who have recovered from the coronavirus.
“In most infectious diseases, except for HIV, we… [+1436 chars]
